meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271.0. The red needle is positioned at approximately 0.038 (between 0.03 and 0.04, specifically at the 4th of 5 small tick marks). Following the '0.01 resolution' rule for interpolation, this value rounds to 0.04. The angle is calculated based on 0 at 12 o'clock and a scale of 0-9 (0.00-0.09) with 36 degrees per unit.
